summary: Replaces the regular Conjuration spell sound with a softer, deeper version.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]

I looked around for some sound replacements for the Conjuration sound, since I really dislike the metal-like shriek from the game, and since I couldn't find one that didn't make my head hurt, I put one together quickly. I'll post it here for anybody who would like to use it as well.

[youtube]OwPSojVoH_0[/youtube]

The source sound was found [url=http://www.freesound.org/people/grandpablaine2/sounds/34961/]here[/url]; I made a couple of changes to it, but of course, the original source must be listed. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/Images/6806/?]Preview image[/url] by Derrax.

To install, place the files in your 'Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data' folder.

Enjoy!


[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
